titles.title: Municipal Advisor Choice Act
To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to provide that an issuer of municipal securities is not required to retain a municipal advisor prior to issuing any such securities.
Municipal Advisor Choice Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Municipal Advisor Choice Act
This bill amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to provide that an issuer of municipal securities is not required to retain a municipal advisor prior to issuing securities.
